body:
It's not a rewire shit!!
Someone remove "rewrite" from its title and tags. As "Jackie Spice" mentioned its a translation and its better than the other one both in terms of English grammar and accuracy. But people may ignore it thinking its a rewire shit! If they just edited the other translation you should use "edited" or something else instead of rewire.
I want to be assauted by a fairy too!
rewrite?  what's with wrong with having 2 different translations of the same doujin
